text.text: The successor to Doom, Quake built upon the technology and

text.name: info5
text.text: gameplay of its predecessor. Unlike the Doom engine before

text.name: info6
text.text: it, the Quake engine offered full real-time 3D rendering

text.name: info7
text.text: and had early support for 3D acceleration through OpenGL.
